tracks.text: In a field of grass, a blond man in a suit and a red haired man in a flack jacket, sit on bicycles and stare at a city in the distance.
The men begin to ride down a hill, arms stretched out.
The 2 men come to  stop in front of a direction sign, with a corporate logo on the left and a dove on the right. The men embrace. The blond man goes left, and the red haired man goes right.
The red-haired man walks down an urban residential street. The pavement is cracked. By a Local Supermakert, people dance in the street in front of a gramophone.
The man picks up an apple from the street, and returns it to an apple stand. He waves to a black man on a fire escape, who waves back. White, brown, and purple birds flock overhead.
An American flag waves over the man. He passes a chalk drawing of children riding a bike down a hill.
Children play jump rope.
The red haired man picks up is phone and waves at the blond man.
The blond man, on the left path, is surrounded by sky scrapers. A billboard for cologne reads "Rough Seas". A single black bird flies overhead.
A child holds a gun in a comic book. Mannequins pose in clothes in a window. On a billboard, a woman in underwear poses provocatively in front of a vacuum.
A man pulls up in a red car and drops a smoking cigarette. In the passenger seat, a woman winks. A billboard for the red car says "Turbo".
The blond man stops in front of the tallest skyscraper. In front of the corporate logo, the blond man receives a brick of cash.
A chart shows a red line climbing quickly until it explodes into red splatter. Outside, the sky darkens.
The blond man speaks at a podium with a microphone, in front of the corporate logo. The logo transforms into 2 American flags, and the podium grows more microphones.
A diagram of an atom breaks into blood spatter
The red-haired man walks by TVs showing the blond man at a press conference. Other TVs show an atom breaking apart and DNA unravelling.
A dove flies. A black bird strikes in mid-air, and then carries the dove off. An F 15 Eagle soars overhead.

Wires climb walls in an alley, and attach to red glowing surveillance cameras. A wrecking ball crashes into an old brick wall, spray painted with a dove. A corporate billboard shows shiny high rises that will replace the brick wall.

People sit despondently in the streets. The red haired man stands on a box, and beckons the crowd to follow him. An old man stands up from the street and shakes the redhead's hands. A vandal spray paints a red X and the word "Liar" over the blond man's poster. The vandal follows the redheaded man.
Overpasses grow over the ubrna neighborhood, casting it in shadow. Factories billow smoke. Surveillance cameras point lasers in 5 directions.

A mob follows the red head to the steps of the white house, which sits at the bottom of the tallest skyscraper. A SWAT team in riot gear raise batons. In a helicopter overhead, soldiers fire automatic guns into the mob. The vandal is centered in a sniper scope. Several people in the mob drop, shot from all directions.
The mob continues forward, throwing bottles at the soldiers in riot gear. Behind them, the blond man talks at a podium. The redhead narrows his eyes.
The SWAT team fires automatic guns at the mob. The blond man looks on in horror. The redhead drops to the ground as blood splatters from every direction.
In a flashback, 2 boys ride bicycles, weaving back and forth.
